documentType: prisoner schedule report and transfer order
summary: This document is a prisoner schedule report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 9, 2019, listing inmates scheduled for court appearances, transfers, and other proceedings. It includes a specific transfer order for two inmates from MCC to a GEO facility. The document is administrative and does not directly mention Jeffrey Epstein or his case, but details the routine operations of the federal detention facility where he was held.

events.title: Prisoner Transfers and Court Appearances at MCC NY
events.description: Administrative schedule detailing the transfer of inmates Javon Bussey and Efrain Reyes, along with numerous other inmates' scheduled court appearances for hearings, sentencings, and plea changes.

locations.context: Location of the MCC New York federal detention facility.

keyFacts: This is a routine prisoner schedule report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York for August 9, 2019, showing no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein.
The document includes a specific transfer order for inmates Javon Bussey and Efrain Reyes to be moved from MCC to a GEO facility, indicating standard prisoner movement procedures.
The report lists numerous other federal inmates with scheduled court appearances before various judges, illustrating the daily judicial workload at the facility.

The document's date (August 8-9, 2019) places it in the timeframe when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death on August 10, 2019, but he is not listed among the scheduled prisoners.
